title: ABC Touch & Feel: B is for Bear: A Very First Book for the Baby You Love
description: This Roger Priddy alphabet board book, B is for Bear, is perfect for babies and toddlers.With touch and feel pages, fun photographs, and cute rhymes for babies and parents to enjoy together, this brilliant book of first words is sure to become a family favorite. Each colorful page will stimulate your child's senses and encourage their imagination â€“ from Apple to Zebra!
author: Roger Priddy
